name: Bruno Land 2: David's Revenge
description:
5 days after Bruno defeated David, David challenges Bruno to a fight again, but Bruno will have the help of Sebastian, a friend made during that time, to defeat him again.

Features:

-Two playable characters

-2 game modes

-2 difficulties

-7 levels (with 4 game modes variants)

-An animated ending

Controls:

← →: To move

Z: To jump

X: To throw rocks (only in boss battle)

C: To change character (only in classic mode)
